import React from 'react' export const NoteForm = (props) => { const { note = { title: '', text: '' } } = props function handleOnChange(key, event) { if (key === "title") { this.note.title = event.target.input; } else if (key === "text") { this.note.text = event.target.input } } return
handleOnChange('title', e)} />
